ygData.subject: RE: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... People in my guild have on occasion offered the same thing. And all I turn down. Getting to level 20, though I want to do it, is something I want to do on
ygData.messageBody:
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, February 08, 2000 1:27 PM

>> And then there are those with he hours to be much higher than we
>> are, but can't seem to figure out how to make those hours turn into
>> levels :(
>>
>> ...What I'm REALLY looking forward to though is hitting level 20. I
>> want to get a last name at least once...
>
> Come to Innoruuk, heh. I think I could bring you to L20 in a few
> sittings ;-) I've got nothing else to do! <g>
>
> Harmonic.

People in my guild have on occasion offered the same thing. And all
I turn down. Getting to level 20, though I want to do it, is something
I want to do on my own power. I do not want to be experience-twinked
to get there. That would take the fun out of the journey.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow -- when I get back from Kelethin)
